ExCnt.EX: In March this year , a vet found a cow dead in a bog and sheep infested with maggots .
He was not gone long but returned with a large piece of tree-bark on which was a writhing heap of fat white maggots

FwkSenCnt.MEANING: grub used for bait in fishing

ExCnt.EX: Other types of bait , such as maggots and lug worms , remain standard-rated .
He threw in a bucket of groundbait , a pint of maggots , and fished all night without a bite .
The fish were well and truly on the stuff , usually on this lake to get daytime bites you have to resort to maggot fishing to achieve any type of result .

FwkSenCnt.MEANING: treatment which uses maggots to clean wounds

ExCnt.EX: A bigger follow-up UK trial on the efficacy of maggot therapy is currently waiting Medical Research Council funding approval .
